function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Comparison of a sample survey with official data sources","Impact":"Misrepresentation or misinterpretation of the data, leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Use multiple methods of data verification and validation, consult with subject matter experts","Technologies":"Data validation software, statistical analysis tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, data analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Use of single-sample hypothesis test for comparison","Impact":"Incorrect conclusions due to reliance on a single test, disregarding other factors and variables","Mitigation":"Use multiple testing methods, consider a wider range of variables, consult with statistical experts","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, hypothesis testing tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, statistical analysis team"},{"Description":"Reliance on a specific software version (Stata software version 14)","Impact":"Limitation in the use of newer, more advanced statistical analysis tools and techniques","Mitigation":"Regularly update and adapt software, explore other statistical software options","Technologies":"Open-source statistical analysis software, cloud-based statistical analysis tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"}]}
